note.p: Birth: His father's parish of Nassenhuben, near Danzig (Gdansk), Poland (27 November 1754)
Career: Professor of Natural History, Cassel (1779); Professor of Natural history, Wilna, Lithuania (1784); became friends with Humboldt (FRS 1815) at Gottingen
Notes: Index to BR enters him as George, by which name, according to DNB, he was commonly known. In R, however, he is entered as 'Georg Forster'.
